scripts.develop: angel repo cells -- npm run develop
scripts.build: angel repo cells -- npm run build && git add --all ./cells/client
scripts.release-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && git push --tags && git push origin master
scripts.release-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push --tags && git push origin master
scripts.release-major: npm run build && npm version major && git push --tags && git push origin master
